description: As Josh Weston, Brad Benton, and Joe Foster hike toward the logging site, they are drawn in another direction by gunfire.Â  Jerek is doing some target practice, and his target is the endangered black falcon.Â  The righteous trio rips the gun from Jerek's hand and offers him an ultimatum...either face the legal authorities or submit to Joe Foster's own brand of punishment.Â  In no time at all, Jerek realizes that satisfying Joe's erotic needs is exactly the kind of punishment he's been missing.
title: Big Timber, Scene #03
